name: fullstack-app
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
